name: backend
description: You are tasked with building a simple RESTful API using Node.js that manages a collection of tasks (e.g., to-do items). The API should allow users to perform basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on tasks. The data should be stored in memory (no database required). Your API should support the following endpoints.

scripts.build: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend

author: Sanket Pujari
